ComicInfo.Summary:
Silent Running: Sonja returns to the place where her family was slain.
The Arena of Dread: Sonja frees the Nubile Barbarians from Lord Sadisto's arena.
The Hanging Tree: Sonja is accused of murdering Hekarah.
Simple Life: After surviving the murder of her family, Sonja teaches Ori a lesson.
For Whom the Bells Trolls: Sonja fights off the advances of Brunor and tangles with a troll.
The Raiding Party: Sonja frees captured warrior women from Hyperborean slavers.
ComicInfo.Title: Silent Running; The Arena of Dread; The Hanging Tree; Simple Life; For Whom the Bells Trolls; The Raiding Party
ComicInfo.Writer: Cullen Bunn,Eric Trautmann,Gail Simone,Luke Lieberman,Roy Thomas,Cullen Bunn,David Walker,Gail Simone,Luke Lieberman,Roy Thomas,Eric Trautmann
